Design a printer that can print 3D objects, allowing users to create their own unique designs and prototypes.
Develop a printer that can print on any surface, including fabric, wood, and even metal, opening up new possibilities for creative expression.
Create a printer that can print images and designs in mid-air, eliminating the need for any physical surface to print on.
Design a printer that can print edible ink, allowing users to create customized and personalized food items.
Develop a printer that can print on the go, using portable ink cartridges and a compact design, making it easy to take with you wherever you go.
